评论详情: I like that they are not just comfortable and well made but also really cute.  I got them in green color.  Will be ordering in brown 😍
I love Taos shoes, I have several pairs, but these sandals didn’t fit me as well as their regular shoes. I really wish they had, :(
I can walk in these all day and they are great if you need arch support.
Wear them all the time!
The shoe is comfortable and stylish.  This is my second pair of sandals from Taos and both fit perfectly and comfortable to wear all day.
I saw the sandals I wanted in a store, but not my size/color.  Received them quickly and they fit perfectly.

I was really hoping to love these sandals and to use them for a trip to Australia and New Zealand where I will be doing alot of walking. I am rating them a 3 star only because the sandals appear well made and are attractive, but since they are  a Taos produce, I expected comfort and good support. It provides neither.  The sandals have little to no forefoot cushioning or arch support.  What a disappointment.
My daughter loves them.
Looks nice, but they need more padding on the footbed.
My preferred brand for summer footwear
I love these sandals! They are great quality, look great on, and very comfortable. I have narrow feet so most sandals don’t stay on well, but these do as they are adjustable. They pack well too!
Comfort is my number one priority in a sandal. Second is the style but Taos hit a home run with these on both counts.  Very comfortable footbed that also means your feet don’t perspire.

评论概述: My wife thinks these are great
评论详情: My wife usually wears the Birkenstocks but she decided to try these out. She thinks they are just as good and comfortable.  Happy feet=Happy wife=Happy life

I really love these sandles. I have purchased several pairs of sandles with the strap around my heels and was not happy. These keep my feet snug, comfortable and they are stylish. Going to purchase another pair.

I like how comfortable these sandals are! I have a bone spur on my big toe, and because these sandals are adjustable I can adjust the fit so that I’m not in pain when wearing them! I like the color as well.
Just bought this second pair because they’re so soft and comfortable out of the box, great arch support, and cute!
These shoes fit great. I bought them for a trip and wore them each of the 4 days. Happy feet!
Liked this shoe from the beginning. Only difference is I liked it the more I ware it. Extremely comfortable 👍
Hurt my ankle shoe cut to high on the ankle
Returned as they are same size I wear & others of this brand but run short.
These are so soft and comfortable!!  And lightweight, too!

Got these sandals for a recent trip to Greece and Italy and they were perfect! Walked 6-7 miles most days and they were comfortable from the start. They look great with jeans, shorts and skirts so they are really versatile.
This is the most comfortable sandal I have ever worn. I like the adjustable straps so they fit snuggly with no slipping around the heel. Great for walking.
So comfortable and sturdy for walking.  Look great with adjustable strsos
I love these sandals. I wanted walkability & style. These are very comfortable. I love the arch support and the secure fit. I often wear 9 to 9,5, I ordered 10s & they feel perfect.
Looks good.  Good foot support and comfortable.  Style works with most occasions (casual to slightly dressy ) Leather is soft and supple. Easy to put on and off (Velcro for fit adjustment.)
Comfortable, great arch support, and they make your feet look pretty!
Love them

I have neuropathy in both feet and up my left leg. It causes me to have balance issues.  I have been looking for sandals without memory foam and these were the answer.  I hope to get another pair in a different color.
Color was as advertised
I love the fit, I brought a second pair because of the comfort I experienced with the first pair in a different color.
I was hesitant to spend the money but needed good supportive sandals for warm weather that were professional enough for work.  These have been great and well worth the money!

These truly are the most comfortable sandals I’ve ever worn!  The arch support is absolutely the best that’s on the market right now; I have fallen arches and have suffered with plantar fasciitis over the years, these sandals felt oh so very good as soon as I put my feet into them!  Great value for the money, you won’t be disappointed!!

Normally, I'm not a big spender on sandals. I bought the knockoffs of these and they were crooked on the top. However, I liked the way they looked otherwise, so I just got the real thing. They are so comfortable and not crooked. I can wear them all day, walking around. Plus, they don't look like most "comfortable shoes" aka ugly.
Beautiful quality and well made sandal. However, it does run large. My usual size 7 was flopping loose while i attempted to walk in them. My recommendation would be to size down one whole size.

FYI- These may run a little bit wide.  I am a C width, yes, not a B and not a D.  They fit my feet perfectly. I can walk all day in these, and have done so on many occasions. I love how you can adjust the straps as the day wears on and my feet swell a bit in the heat. I own them in three colors!  Do not buy them if you have a high instep ( the bony part at the top of your foot before your ankle).
I barely had to break these sandals in. They are cute and very comfortable. I can walk down a hill in them without feeling like my foot is sliding out of the sandal.

I bought Taos sandals for a trip to Europe.  I needed comfortable, breathable support that could take me 15,000 plus steps per day.  These sandals did not disappoint and they went with everything I wore.  They still look great after weeks of ‘abuse’.  The quality is exceptional…almost too good because they are never going to wear out and I won’t need to buy new ones.  I love them!
Designer by a Dr..
As comfortable as all the reviews say Very strong Velcro closure
These are great for long days.  Good quality, little pricey but necessary for achy feet.

评论概述: I thought they would have some arch support....
评论详情: Comfortable sandals but they don't provide any arch support and that is what I expected they would have.  I also thought that the heel would be a little higher and it wasn't.  I won't be able to wear these for an extended period of time however they are comfortable.
Love the material the great walking shoe, although the arch is not as good as could be.
Some of the best sandals I've purchased
Wore these in Italy and so comfortable.  Really versatile in camel color! LOVE these shoes.
Great fit and very comfortable.  I wear them almost daily.
Beautiful sandal, nice adjustable straps. Comfortable.

I liked the dark blue color of the shoes.  They aren't as comfortable as I thought they would be. I think Pikolinos are the most comfortable shoes for me. The straps seem to be somewhat loose over my feet.

I've been eyeing this style of Taos sandals for a while and I don't know why I just now have them a chance. These are hands down the most comfortable sandals my feet have been in! These beauties check all the boxes for comfort (soft and supportive footbed), solid straps (with adjustable Velcro), spot on sizing (9M fit like a glove), light, beautiful blue color, easy to put on and take off. I feel like I could run in these. 100% 5-⭐ recommend!

I love the way these have a very comfortable fit right from the start. The leather is supple and not stiff. The straps give it good support, and I will be using these as casual sandals on a trip to Europe.

oh how I wanted to love these shoes they’re very Stylish, Love the color the fit is nice too but in my opinion, definitely not worth the money I expected more arch support For that price, I’m going to have to send them back
I love these sandals. Haven’t had as much feet, leg and back pain since I’ve been wearing them. Too bad they don’t have a good close toed shoe in this brand TAOS.
Stylish
I love my shoes. I have several pair, they are  perfect for me !

Sandals just came to the door and felt like butter right out of the box.. it’s the velcro that makes the perfect fit. I usually wear 81/2 but the 8s fit like a glove, since no 1/2 size options.. I worried.. More attractive than pictured, dress up or down. .. quality is evident.

I bought the white and black ones at my local shoe store.  Love the fit and comfort.  When I saw this them in this color on the website on Amazon and on sale I bought them.  What a nice color, fun to wear for nicer occasions.
Comfy but overpriced and need to have 1/2 sizes a little too big
Size is perfect. Color great. Have not walked great lengths with them on but so far their great and have high quality leather.👍
Walked all over in these on vacation straight from the box - so comfy
I love everything about these sandals!
A well made sandal. Very comfortable and attractive.
Very comfortable and supportive for high arches and problem feet.  Love the turquoise color. Were out of silver or I would have bought it too. I already have the gold metallic.
I am so pleased with this pair of shoes, very comfortable, fit perfectly. Great for a long thin foot.

Happy with this purchase. Was not sure of size because they have no half sizes. I made the right choice. I usually wear a size 7 to 7 1/2 went with the 7 because my foot is slim. It was the right choice for me. So comfortable and love the real leather. I will purchase this brand again.
Goid quality and very comfortable

I can’t say enough about these sandals! They are so pretty. The straps at the front and back that can be adjusted are definitely a plus. I have a medium width foot, but these are roomy.  The leather is like butter! I got the camel color, which is very pretty. It will go with everything.  And the comfort! They actually have some support! I can imagine being able to walk in these. Just got them, so I will have to see.  I almost didn’t get them because of the price, it these are so well made, they are worth it.
I bought these to wear at a concert where we’d be standing for several hours. Fabulous! Buy every color

I bought my first Taos sandals ten years ago and since then I have been buying only this brand footware for summer. Superb quality, comfort and looks. Purchased these sandals for our trip to Niagara Falls. Was wearing them for three days spent there without feeling any discomfort during our long walks - 14 miles a day according to the smartphone app. Price is the only thing which can be "improved" for these sandals. But then we get what we pay for.

It is difficult at best to find casual shoes or sandals today in this price range that aren’t designed with all Velcro straps. What happened to straps with buckles? They offer a much better fit not to mention they raise the style bar. I have narrow ankles and not a lot of muscle on my feet so being “adjustable” is misleading. They only adjust as far as the Velcro allows. I had to return these. Both straps at their tightest were too loose for my feet.
The Sandler are so comfortable and have great support

Like: sandal is well made and great support. leather is also very nice.  Dislike: comfortable when first on. after wearing for an hour, realized strap was rubbing bottom of ankle and causing blister. sadly these expensive sandals are in my donation bag.
These sandals are beautiful.  Great arch support.  Fits perfectly.  Definitely worth the money.

评论概述: Great comfort while giving great support.
评论详情: I have had multiple foot surgeries and currently wear orthotics. This sandal gives me proper support, comfort, and great style.
I liked that they were sturdy, comfortable and well constructed.
So comfortable and elegant enough for dressed up event.

Bought these for a trip to NY with a lot of walking and wanted something nicer than a sneaker but comfortable. I actually wanted a different style of the same brand but it didn’t ship fast enough. I read reviews and bought these on reviews of comfort. The reviews are true no break in period. No blisters, padded ankle back and the Velcro top straps make a supremely comfortable toe box even for wide feet like mine. NEVER thought I’d own a pair of Velcro shoes u til o was at least 70. They’re great. Work great for travel.

评论概述: Extremely comfortable sandal from day one!
评论详情: Took to Europe where I walked 3-4 miles everyday. Highly recommend.

These sandals are beautifully made and soft as butter! They are true to size and adjustable in the right spots. They are a bit pricey, but worth the cost. In addition, they are easy on the feet, being orthotics, with a great arch support for those of us with high arches. I love the camel color of mine. I’m banking on these shoes lasting me a long time; if not, I will be back to revise my review.
Comfortable the moment you put them on. Usually sandals take several times wearing to break in, not these the were Comfortable from day 1.  Very well made, nice padded heal!
I love these!  They are so comfortable and go with everything. I wore them to a broadway show in NYC and walked the streets and my bad foot and ankle felt fine.
Those sandals are comfortable from day one! Can dress up or dress down! Love em!
Ultra comfortable. Bought second pair in another color.
Very happy with my purchase. They are as described.

These sandals are the most comfortable sandals I've ever had.  I have a rather wide foot, in-between medium and wide, so some shoes don't fit well, but these are fantastic from the very first wearing!  I highly recommend them!

I have trouble feet due to 24 years of standing all day teaching.  My podiatrists stated no more "cheap shoes."  After much shopping and grumbling about the price of the sandals he recommended, I brought out my visa and order this brand.  I was not disappointed.  This shoe provides a soft but supportive footbed with multiple adjustable straps.  The color is a medium soft brown that is complementary with pants or dresses.

It is hard to find a sandal that is stylish but comfortable. I don't like anything between my toes so that cuts out 60% of the selection on Amazon right there. The rest are often clunky or masculine. These are elegant, feminine, and comfortable. I wear them all day at work or out running errands. I bought black and blue. The shade of blue is especially lovely. I've been wearing them for a couple months now. Highly recommend.

I have been looking for a stylish and comfortable sandal that is wide enough for my somewhat wide toe box. Most of the wide width sandals on the market are too wide for me.  After purchasing numerous brands and styles, icluding other Taos styles, I found these and I love them!  They are lightweight and stylish.  The leather is soft, there is adequate arch support, and I can easily adjust the width of the toe straps to accomodate my somewhat wide foot.  They don't have much underfoot cushioning, however.  I'm hopeful that they will withstand a long day of walking on cobblestone streets on my next trip to Europe.

评论概述: Not for ladies with high insteps
评论详情: If you have high instep the middle strap will be off center.  But super comfortable

评论概述: very comfortable, also good for wide feet
评论详情: I don't know what type of feet I have, other than lots of shoes hurt my feet. These I can walk all day and they're great! I love that I can adjust the front and back straps to be wider (which is great for my right foot which has a bunion, and overall more space is better for my feet). I think I have flat feet but I'm not sure. All I know is that these have a little bit of an elevation so they are very comfortable and I love these shoes so much I bought another pair to have for next summer.
I have bad feet, but I can wear these sandals mostly all day.  Love them
These sandals are not only beautiful, my feet love them!  The comfort, support and ease of putting them on is incredible!
I have worn Taos sandals for years.  This was a new style for me and I loved them.  I especially like Taos's use of leather throughout their shoes and good arch support.

评论概述: Very comfortable, excellent quality, cute style!
评论详情: I absolutely love these sandals! I’ve had surgery on one foot and have arthritis in it now, and these shoes are so comfortable and cute, and for the first time in a long time, I have much less pain in my feet!
These sandals are light weight, provide great support and are very durable
Love them, very comfy.
Looks goods Feels great
Was not happy with this sandals

Sadly I had to return these sandals because they were too open to be practical for my normal daily housework (in a B & B) where I tend to be hard on my feet from dropping things on them or stubbing my toes.
These are one of most comfortable pair of sandals that i have had in a while. Wish i could find them again!
